author: gstein
msg: Many of the tests aren't actually being run, or some of them are run via
scripts. Enable marking some of the test programs to be skipped.

author: sussman
msg: New function to recursively remove a dir.  It's written entirely using
apr routines -- perhaps apr wants it?  I've tested to make sure this
routine works (but not checked in the test.)

author: kfogel
msg: Get rid of the "im" and "imp" aliases "import".
See thread "ugly aliases" on dev@subversion.tigris.org for related

author: kfogel
msg: Get rid of the "df" alias for "diff"; "di" is what CVS uses, and "df"
has other baggage associated with it.
See thread "ugly aliases" on dev@subversion.tigris.org for related
